conclusion: The electromotive force of the power supply is E=6V, the internal resistance is r=2Ω, the fixed resistors are R1=2Ω, R2=3Ω, R3=6Ω, and the capacitance of the capacitor is C=10μF.
The equivalent resistance of the parallel combination of R2 and R3 is R23=2Ω.
The total resistance of the circuit is R_total=6Ω.
The current I in the circuit is 1A.
The voltage across R1 is U1=2V.
The voltage across the capacitor C is U_C=2V.
The charge Q on the capacitor is Q=20μC.
